Open another issue with MCVE if this is a reproducible bug, thanks.
you means that  just  IOS  has this issue ?
Provide a reproducible example at http://dotwe.org/vue
There is no plan support in the short term. You are welcome to submit pr
Fixed in https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/pull/205

That's because js framework wrapped `try catch` to the [callback functions](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/0.19.0/runtime/bridge/CallbackManager.js#L65-L70) and [event handlers](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/rc-0.20.0/runtime/vdom/Element.js#L485-L496) and console it out. I think it's a good idea to throw the exceptions to native handlers, I'll remove those `try catch` in the next version.

时间较久libweexjsc.so 的符号文件已经丢失
建议你们升级一下 weex_sdk. 在观察是否还存在这个问题. 编译 libweexcore.so后记得保留符号文件哈.
done ，thanks！

> @fantasysea 这个问题解决了吗？同样遇到这个问题

gradle的配置发一下看看

Sorry, we couldn't call commitCriticalExceptionRT in this method. Besides, logs with level of WXLogFlagWarning and WXLogFlagError are handled by appMonitorHandler, you could change your implementation of WXAppMonitorProtocol.
Do you still have other dynamic fixes? Like js patch? Weex did not appear to be removed
你们最近有发布改动非常大的页面吗？应用都上架了，怎么会被苹果发现？

> Do you still have other dynamic fixes? Like js patch? Weex did not appear to be removed

our app not used JSPatch. only use weex

@fantasticcmm @ttarigo 尝试修改下gradle中的配置路径，sdk需要从weex的根目录拷贝so和js文件。
直接import，配置相对路径文件各种找不到
- 第一步，声明weex的根目录 `String weexRootPath = '/Users/xxx/xxx/incubator-weex"`
- 第二步，修改相对路径
   - `'../../pre-build'`改为`weexRootPath+'/pre-build'`
   - `'../../weex_core/CMakeLists'`改为`weexRootPath+'/weex_core/CMakeLists.txt'`
   - `dir:"../../weex_core"`改为`dir:weexRootPath+"/weex_core"`
http://dotwe.org/vue/ca5ef0dd40e57d3aa6c3ec8f24752a3d
可以给苹果回复邮件，说明自己的App并没有在应用审核后，利用任何动态能力修改应用行为。言辞一定要肯定。
如果有问题可以留一下电话，详细沟通一下。

> 可以给苹果回复邮件，说明自己的App并没有在应用审核后，利用任何动态能力修改应用行为。言辞一定要肯定。

已经上架将近1个月的时间了，最近突然被下架了，可能是因为苹果的复查机制

我也遇到这个问题，示例如下
list:  http://dotwe.org/vue/b062c66787944d15eb63b659f388df90
recycle-list:  http://dotwe.org/vue/43bea46240bba1e4ee34b057a6b818ac

代码：Floor.vue 中click方法

list 可以获取参数
recycle-list 不可以

问题环境：原生平台

补充：参考文档https://github.com/Hanks10100/weex-native-directive#%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6%E7%9A%84%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6 ， 不知道什么版本完善组件自定义事件

Generated by :no_entry_sign: dangerJS

有尝试过，只是有些地方实在是看不懂，以至于无从下手，比如这个文档：
https://weex.apache.org/cn/references/modules/websocket.html

里面提到：

> **iOS和h5提供 WebSockets 的 protocol 默认实现，安卓使用需要提供自定义 adapter 实现**

安卓不提供默认实现，主要是基于哪方面的考虑？

WeexPlayground 既然已经实现，为何不整合进来？
@YorkShen done!
@xiaoyuzi1001 you can download the latest playground app from [playground.html](http://weex.apache.org/tools/playground.html) or open your playground app now, you will receive an upgrade message.

the WebSockets  module  need the extra dependence of squareup lib , look the [https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/android/playground/app/build.gradle](url)
compile 'com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp:2.3.0'
compile 'com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp-ws:2.3.0'
可以把里面内容展开试试
Sorry，recycle-list has not support 'header' and 'sticky'
may be, you can submit a pull request to fix the problem. and to be an weex committer

外部库如果直接整合进来，不知道会不会有法律问题，或者道德问题，如果既能兼顾法律，又能整合，那是最好的。
感觉还是 开箱即用 更重要一些，不然有些小团队如果没有安卓程序员，只有 js 程序员，就会比较麻烦。
如果哪天能提供一个类似 Flash 的 IDE 环境就好了。
我这边临时先用 eros 好了，安卓代码对我来说还是太陌生，暂时帮不上忙。
非常感谢 @zshshr 的热心解答，辛苦了。
I alo met this problem.Weex is not kind enough to windows platfom.
It seems there has an existing issue talk about it https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit/issues/337 , and you already found it. I think you can track the progress there.
I think `z-index` is really useful, and can't be achieved by other css styles. I suggest to have a plan to support it.

In most cases, Weex is a multiple-page app, not an SPA. It means the `Vue` variable is different in different pages. (http://weex-project.io/cn/guide/use-vue.html#shang-xia-wen)

You should register your plugin in each pages, not just once.
Currently we have no plans to support it at this time.
It looks like a bug.We will fix it ASAP.
Weex do not support this case.
Unable to reproduce.
Unable to reproduce
